rows.label: bf05400100_0010
rows.name: So why is Turtle-chan coming along too?

rows.label: bf05400100_0030
rows.name: This isn't a game, you know?

rows.label: bf05400100_0040
rows.name:
I've heard a lot about
these Iira people.

rows.label: bf05400100_0050
rows.name:
They're gathering a lot of
Core Crystals, they say.

rows.label: bf05400100_0070
rows.name:
I can't pretend this
doesn't concern us, too.

rows.label: bf05400100_0080
rows.name: If the name Iira is real...
